System_default_time.title: ⏱️ Time System
System_default_time.description:
My time system transforms what you write into a date.
It supports 7 different types of written time.

fields.name: 📝 Writing Formats
fields.value:
> `y - h - m - s` - Year, Hour, Minute, Second
 
> `1h 10m 40s` - `1m 10s` - `2h 10m`
 
> `2 days 10 minutes 5 seconds`
 
> `30/01/2022 14:35:25` *Seconds are optional*
 
> `today 14:35` - `tomorrow 14:35`
 
> `09:10` - `14:35` - `30/01/2022` - `00:00`
 
> `Sunday 11:00` - `Monday` - `Tuesday 17:00`

fields.name: {{e.QuestionMark}} Status
fields.value1: The set time cannot be in the past
